definition: Li Yapeng (1971-), PRC actor
plum
surname Li
second/next to/inferior/sub-/Taiwan pr. [ya3]
Asia/Asian/Taiwan pr. [Ya3]
Peng, large fabulous bird/roc

sentences.english: Li Yapeng said that the little girl had been born with a cleft lip in his blog in August.
sentences.chinese: 李亚鹏于8月份在其博客上公开了女儿患唇裂的消息。

sentences.english: Wongs daughter, Li Yan, was born on May 27 last year.
sentences.chinese: 王菲和李亚鹏的女儿李嫣于去年5月27日出生。

sentences.english: Li Yapeng should not be excessive, in eye also pan- thioindigo red.
sentences.chinese: 李亚鹏别过头，眼里还泛着红光。

sentences.english: Wong's daughter, Li Yan, was born on May 27 last year.
sentences.chinese: 王菲和李亚鹏的女儿李嫣于去年5月27日出生。
